title: Exploring Visible Light Communication System Using RTS/CTS Mechanism for Mobile Environment
abstract: This work presents a software-centric visible light communication (VLC) system in full duplex mode with CSMA/CA and RTS-CTS in mobile environment. We focus on channel access mechanism problems in the same environment. To solve these we modify Distributed Coordination function (DCF) by adding ambient light measurement slot. The result shows modified DCF can handle the problems.
booktitle: Proceedings of the 24th Annual International Conference on Mobile Computing and Networking
